location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Coll 29/90 'Bushire: vice consulate; accommodation and supply of furniture'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 17; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file concerns the supply of furniture to the British Consulate at Bushire, and the Foreign Office's proposal that Indian Revenues should bear half of the cost.The file is composed of correspondence between the Foreign Office, the India Office, the Government of India, and the Political Residency in the Persian Gulf.
